title: Marnie Simpson claims Lewis Bloor cheated on her with mystery brunette on Valentine's Day: 'You f**king scumbag'
text:
No wonder Lewis Bloor and Marnie Simpson have broken up yet again. 
Just hours after the couple shared cryptic social media posts suggesting they've parted ways, claims have emerged suggesting that the TOWIE hunk was unfaithful. 
Ammelia Gueste, 24, met the reality star outside Drake's concert in London last week, and claims that they shared a ride together. 
A shocking recording made on the night shows a half-naked Lewis in bed and sharing a snog under the covers with the brunette beauty while a friend films the intimate moment. Marnie and Lewis had apparently split again (Photo: FameFlynet) It's emerged that Lewis may have cheated (Photo: WENN) 
She told The Sun : “My friend spotted him as we were queueing up for a ride back to our hotel after the gig. We asked what he was doing and he said his mates had gone back to Essex without him. 
“As a joke I asked if he wanted to come in to Central London with us and he jumped in the back. 
Amelia claims that while in the taxi, an intoxicated Lewis tried to become intimate with her. 
“As soon as we got in to the car he started telling me he wanted to kiss me. The driver did pull over so he could buy some more booze, he picked up a bottle of vodka and a bottle of Red Bull. Read More Gordon Ramsay's in-laws to appear in court charged with hacking the celebrity chef's emails Lewis went out on Valentines Day without Marnie (Photo: Snapchat/MarnieGshore) 
In the vehicle things apparently became bizarre very quickly, with the woman continuing: “There was loads of traffic and we were playing drinking games in the back – he was begging me to spit neat vodka in to his mouth," added the woman. 
After getting back to his hotel room with a pal, Amelia said that Lewis became incredibly flirty and things were quick to escalate to the next level. Read More Marnie Simpson and Sophie Kasaei enjoy a night out in Newcastle at the Geordie Shore wrap party 
“I was so shocked when I found out that he had a girlfriend, but by that point we had already kissed several times. 
She added: “We were kissing, but he didn’t touch me inappropriately – I kept pushing him off when his hands ventured too far.” Marnie hinted at their breakup on social media (Photo: Snapchat) 
Just hours after the story broke, Marnie took to social media to confirm the news and slam her ex-boyfriend's womanising ways. 
She wrote in a scathing Twitter rant: "Didn't really want the whole country to know but looks like that didn't last long . Happy Valentine's Day to me. U f**king scumbag!" 
Earlier today, she made a cryptic post that hinted she had parted ways with Lewis yet asgain. 
She wrote: "Don't make eternal life long promises with a deceiver They wont change. And u always end up getting your broken!"
